title: My Champion, health bar and name lags when my camera is locked
body:
when my camera is locked on my champion the camera follows me but in lags like small lag spikes. 
pls someone know how to fix.

replies.body:
Can you define "lag" a bit more? Are you seeing any changes in your FPS during this time? There's a feature called *Movement Prediction* that causes similar symptoms. Can you ensure the feature is disabled? I've provided a screenshot of where it is in your in-game settings:

https://imgur.com/a/OSXlP

Let me know if this caused any change.
